channel.title: I got 2 questions
channel.description:
the first is,how do i unban ppl? and the second is,i got the fr33sc4p3 source so, how do i make the wise old men say if im online or offline?
if you answer both of these questions and it works, you get free admin

item.title: I got 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

Stag…

How to unban people when they are Banned-

Go to your Data Folder. ( In the main folder a.k.a Fr33sc4p3 )

Go to ‘Banned Users.’

Find there name.

Right click there name, and hit ‘Delete.’

Then they are un-Banned.

P.S Give the Admin spot to someone else. ~Ashley.

Read full topic

item.title: I got 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

i think u should get them out of the banned files in ur server that will be the ban map and for that u should look in npc handler

then look for thisif (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Thug Life"))[/code[ change the thuglife to ur name and beneed that ther is thuglife online thuglife offline change the thug life to ur name
